NAME: フルネーム

SHOULD_BE_A_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Should be a valid email address.
SHOULD_BE_AT_LEAST_X_CHARACTERS_LONG: Should be at least {{minlength}} characters long.

SHOULD_BE_A_VALID_LANGUAGE_NAME: Should be a valid language name.
